definition: apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

sentences.english: As for the film itself, I can simply report that it isn't too bad at all.
sentences.chinese: 至於影片本身，我只能說，還不算糟糕透頂。

sentences.english: The whole family is rotten to the core.
Choose sitting on that couch watching mind- numbing sprit-crushing game shows, stuffing fucking junk food into your mouth.
sentences.chinese: 選擇在沙發上看無聊透頂的節目，往嘴裏塞垃圾食物。

sentences.english: Mrs. Smith was worried sick, and Chase is practically a basket case.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯太太都急出病來了，而蔡斯簡直就絕望透頂了。

sentences.english: But the Taiwanese people had lost all faith in he KMT, and refused it another chance.
sentences.chinese: 但百姓對國民黨已失望透頂，不再給它機會。

sentences.english: If you will put up with my atrocious pronunciation, I would like to read you a few pages of your ancestor's work.
sentences.chinese: 如果您能忍受我糟糕透頂的發音，咱們不妨念幾頁。

sentences.english: The bird has a tuft of red on top of its head.
sentences.chinese: 這諄鳥的透頂上有一小簇紅色蹬羽毛。

sentences.english: The new military rulers said that the previous government had been riddled with corruption.
sentences.chinese: 新的軍事統治者說，前政府已經腐敗透頂。

sentences.english: The game was "terrible, " Buffett recalls. "Humiliating, " says Osberg.
sentences.chinese: 巴菲特回憶說，那場橋牌打得糟糕透頂。

sentences.english: Getting up in the morning is pretty terrible.
sentences.chinese: 早上起牀的感覺簡直糟糕透頂。

sentences.english: Michael was too clever and intelligent for me.
sentences.chinese: 邁克爾聰明透頂，我鬥不過他。

sentences.english: He built private houses whit public funds. The whole thing smells to high heaven.
sentences.chinese: 他用公款蓋房這件事真是腐敗透頂。

sentences.english: How does a 15)lunatic like you help a guy like me?
sentences.chinese: 荒謬透頂，像你這樣的瘋子怎麼能幫助像我這樣的人？

sentences.english: But the Taiwanese people had lost all faith inthe KMT, and refused it another chance.
sentences.chinese: 但百姓對國民黨已失望透頂，不再給它機會。

sentences.english: I spend 5 nights at this hotel, and I was very disappointed.
sentences.chinese: 我在這家酒店住了5晚，失望透頂了。

sentences.english: Is fear of being single keeping you in a bad relationship?
sentences.chinese: 是否單身的恐懼讓你的人際關係糟糕透頂？
